## Data

```{r data}

brands <- read.csv2(file="BelkinElagoComplete.csv")

brands_incomplete <-read.csv2(file="SurveyIncomplete.csv")
#Glimpse data
glimpse(brands)

glimpse(brands_incomplete)
#Show first six rows
head(brands)

#Check for missing values
sapply(brands, {function(x) any(is.na(x))})
```
